Name: Cauldus Nerve-blocker Laser Pistol
Notes: Knocks over target on a natural 9 or 10 To Hit, target disarmed if knocked over.

Name: Magnetising Hotshot LaserPistol
Notes: +1 bonus To Hit if you have previously hit the target with this weapon.

Name: GL779 Intellipistol
Notes: Fires with Energy Weapons Skill Bonus of 9, ignores firearms skill.

Name: Skollanga 'Slammer' SMG
Notes: Target knocked over on a natural 9 or 10 To Hit.

Name: Laifan ABS Serrator
Notes: On a natural 1 To Hit the weapon inflicts 10 Energy damage on user.

Name: BD90 Warhammer
Notes: At short range knock over a target on a natural 8, 9 or 10 To Hit. Malfunctions on a natural 1.

Name: GalSpec 109 Sniper Rifle
Notes: In Sniper Mode +15 to Kinetic Weapons score

Name: AMP Rifle Grip Punch Bolter
Notes: Destroys Armour. Opponent knocked over on hit.

Name: AMP Shoulder Mounted Annihilator
Notes: Destroys Armour. Opponent Inflicts 60 vehicle and spaceship scale damage. Ignores shields.

Name: Missile Launcher (Anti-Aircraft)
Notes: Ignore Range hit number when attacking spacecraft.

Name: Plasma Cannon
Notes: Firer knocked over unless weapon is tripod mounted.

Name: Altair JP60 Accelerator
Notes: Firer knocked over unless weapon is tripod mounted.
